SEARCH
Package Millgame.Model

Klasse Model

java.lang.Object
Millgame.Model.Model
public class Model extends Object
The Logic of the Application Mill game. WHITE is Player 1. BLACK is Player 2. Checks the Players turn (Black or White) and start a new game. Checks State of Player to circle through each state. States can be 'SET','MOVE','JUMP', 'STEAL'. Move from player to another position. Steal Stones from enemy with given position.

    • isEmptyField

      public boolean isEmptyField(int pos)
      Checks is Players input an Empty field.
      Parameter:
      pos - of user input.
      Gibt zurück:
      wrong entry.
      Löst aus:
      RuntimeException - if field is taken.
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - if no field is selected.

    • steal

      public void steal(int pos)
      Player is in steal Mode if he has made a mill with own Stones. Checks if Player has made a Mill with own Stones. If Mill the switch player into steal Mode. Is position valid and not Empty and opponents Stone than he can steal that Stone.
      Parameter:
      pos - given position to steal from opponent.

    • setPlayer

      public void setPlayer(int pos)
      Sets the Players settable Stones at Position.
      Parameter:
      pos - given through user input.
      Löst aus:
      RuntimeException - unexpected use of method.
